T02n2934u_001:435: 73 tato'vadhūtyā bahiranirgamo bodhicittabindau cit- tavāhanaprāṇavāyor niveśanaṃ śūnyataikarasaṃ dhāraṇā |
T02n2934u_001:438: tadā vajramaṇyantargatam acyutaṃ bodhicittaṃ krameṇa niṣyandādisukhāpūrṇaṃ vaimalyaṃ yāved eṣyati |
T02n2934u_001:439: 74 tato dhāraṇāpraviṣṭe citte nimittapratibhāsapūrvakam utpa- nnamaṇḍaladevatādarśanaṃ pratibimbākāraṃ nirvikalpakaṃ tato'nekaraśmispharaṇaṃ tatas traidhātukaspharaṇam ity anusmṛtiḥ |
T02n2934u_001:440: (31) 75 tataḥ sa eva nirvikalpo yogo'kṣaramahāsukhamayayugana- ddhātmakajñānadehamahāvajradharasvabhāvaḥ samādhir iti |
T02n2934u_001:441: 76 evaṃ ca yogī yadā niṣprapañcaprajñopāyayogātmā tadā sar- vapuṇyamayaḥ sarvajñānamayaḥ samastamāṇḍaleyadevatāt- makaḥ sakalapāramitāmayaś ca nāthair vyavasthāpyate |
T02n2934u_001:442: 77 tad uktam- ayaṃ sa paramo yogaḥ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:443: yogī yatra sthitaḥ sākṣāt sarvajño bhagavān bhavet ||
T02n2934u_001:444: idaṃ tat paramaṃ tattvaṃ prajñopāyamayaṃ śivam |
T02n2934u_001:445: idam evādvayaṃ jñānaṃ bodhicittam idaṃ param ||
T02n2934u_001:447: 78 uktaṃ cāryanāgārjunapādaiḥ- yaḥ pumān kṣaṇam apy ekaṃ bodhicittaṃ prabhāvayet |
T02n2934u_001:448: aśakyo gaṇituṃ tasya puṇyarāśir iyān iti ||
T02n2934u_001:452: 79 sarvam etad abhipretyāha- ete cittasya śuddhateti |
T02n2934u_001:454: 80 ata eva mahāsukharūpāyā vajradharabhūmer atraiva pra- tipādanāt pāramitānayād asya viśeṣaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:455: 81 nanv asāv advayajñānarūpaiva tat ko'sya viśeṣaḥ?
T02n2934u_001:457: yathā vas- tutaḥ śūnyataikarasānāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāṃ śrāvakanaye pratipāditānām api śūnyatāyā apratipādanāt,
T02n2934u_001:458: pāramitānaye ca pratipādanān mahān viśeṣo gīyate |
T02n2934u_001:459: 83 nanu ca prathamadhyānalābhino'pi cakravartina iva sukham upadiśyate,
T02n2934u_001:461: tathāhi pramododrekād eva prathamā bhūmiḥ pramuditocyate |
T02n2934u_001:466: na hi sūcichidraṃ chidram ity evākāśenāpi sāmyam anubhavati |
T02n2934u_001:468: yac cānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhisukham iti? 86 uktam etat |
T02n2934u_001:471: tasmāt tad apy anenaiva krameṇa boddhavyam |
T02n2934u_001:472: 87 tat kiṃ pāramitānaye na bodhiḥ? 88 naivam |
T02n2934u_001:473: prajñāpāramitayā vinā kuto'nuttarāyāḥ samyak- sambodher gandho'pi |
T02n2934u_001:474: paraṃ paryante'py avaśyam etam upāyam apekṣata ity ucyata ity alam ativistareṇa |
T02n2934u_001:476: 89 mahāsukhasādhanatvena pradhānaṃ sparśaviṣayaṃ tadindriyaṃ tajjñānaṃ ca karuṇādirūpaṃ pañcaprajñārūpaṃ ca pratipādayitum āha- ata ityādi |
T02n2934u_001:477: 90 bāhyaprajñāyāḥ kāyasya viṣayasya tadyogād ādhyātmi- kakāyajñānayoś ca śodhanād yad bhavati tad vakṣyāmi dṛṣṭi- yuktam iti |
T02n2934u_001:486: vinā tu mahāmudrāyogaṃ badhyate jagad ity āha - darśanād ityādi |
T02n2934u_001:491: śūnyatayā vinā karuṇādayo'pi na muktihetava iti bhāvaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:494: 95 evam abhyāsaparasya yathāmilitāhārasaṃskāram āha- yad ityādi |
T02n2934u_001:496: 96 na kevalaṃ tad ratikrīḍādikaṃ ca mahāmudrāpi mahāmudrārūpaṃ draṣṭavyam,
T02n2934u_001:505: 99 nanv āsāṃ paramā pūjā kamanam eva, sa ca doṣaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:515: tatra tattvarūpātmasamāropasya mātrādisamāropavat pāraṃparyeṇa bodhisādhanatvād adoṣaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:516: 102 nanu keṣāṃcid anubhavasyāpi niṣiddhatvād virodhaḥ syāt |
T02n2934u_001:525: (36) 103 mahāmudrādvayayogayuktaś ca yogī sakalam alobhādyāt- makaṃ jagad avalokayati |
T02n2934u_001:526: tato'sau sarveryāpathasaṃyuto'py akuśalānupalambharūpatvāt kuśalātmaivety āha- sa yogītyādi |
T02n2934u_001:529: tasmāt prajñopāyasvabhāvādvayabodhicittabhāva- naiva sarvapāpaviśodhanī sarvaśreyaskarī ca |
T02n2934u_001:530: 105 tad uktam āryanāgārjunapādaiḥ- mahāyānam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bodhicittam idaṃ param |
T02n2934u_001:535: 106 evaṃ ca vijñātavyam- ayaṃ sa paramo yogas tasmād vandyas tathāgataiḥ |
T02n2934u_001:539: śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ karma yad anyad api mantrajam |
T02n2934u_001:543: yac ca nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ caturdhā bhūmayo daśa |
T02n2934u_001:544: phalāvasthā ca sarvaṃ tad yogād asmāt samut- thitam ||
T02n2934u_001:545: bhūtā ye ca bhaviṣyanti bhavanti jinasūnavaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:546: lokeśādyā mahāsattvās te'py atraiva vyavasthi- tāḥ ||
T02n2934u_001:547: atītānāgatā buddhā vartamānā matāś ca ye |
T02n2934u_001:550: tāvantaḥ sarva etasmād yogād eva vinirgatāḥ ||
T02n2934u_001:552: yāvantaḥ sthiracalā bhāvās tāvantas tad- apāśrayāḥ ||
T02n2934u_001:554: 107 pañcakāmān vinā nīrasaiva śūnyatā syād ity āha- yāvetyādi |
T02n2934u_001:555: yāvan na viṣayarasaiḥ paripālyate bodhicittāṅkuras tāvan na buddhakāyakalpataruḥ prādurbhavati,
T02n2934u_001:557: 108 tad uktaṃ sarahapādaiḥ- tanutaracittāṅkurako viṣayarasair yadi na sicy- ate śuddhaiḥ |
T02n2934u_001:559: (39) iti paṇḍitābhayākaraguptakṛtāyām abhayapaddhatyāṃ śrībuddhakāpalamahātantraṭīkāyāṃ trayodaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
T02n2934u_001:560: (40) 14 jāpamudrādhyeṣaṇāsarvatantranidānapaṭala 1 abhimataniruttarārthadeśanayā saṃjātaprasādātiśayā yathā stuvanti tad darśayitum āha- athetyādi
T02n2934u_001:579: 15 ekaruteneti na tu prathamaṃ durbodham abhidhāya va- canāntaraiḥ prakaṭitā |
T02n2934u_001:588: yatas teṣāṃ hetuphalātmako ji- navarair vineyeṣu gopitaḥ sudurlabho'rthaḥ sugūḍhago- care'smiṃs tantre mayā prakaṭīkṛtaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:591: ato manmukhena tair eva kṛtā deśaneyam iti bhāvaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:592: 23 mayi ca viparītadeśanāparādhādhyāropād akṣamā na kartavyety āha- kṣamaṃtu,
T02n2934u_001:594: 24 sarvatantram uktvābhiṣiktānām evātrādhikāra iti darśayituṃ paryante'bhiṣekavidhim āha-athetyādi |
T02n2934u_001:601: 29 kim evam prajñātoṣaṇe yatna ity āha- sarvabuddhaiḥ pūjitā |
T02n2934u_001:602: hetuphalāvasthayoḥ karmamudrāyogenaiva hi mahāmudrāsiddhir ity āmnāyaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:603: 30 katham evam ity āha- atraiva prajñāyāṃ sthitā buddhādayaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:607: 31 ata eva prajñājñānasya svarūpaṃ pratipādayati- (43) indītyādi |
T02n2934u_001:612: 34 sarvam idam asvabhāvaṃ yatra nopalabhyate sā paramā- nandagatiḥ |
T02n2934u_001:615: 35 tad uktaṃ dvikalpatantre- paramānande tu saṃprāpte nānātvavarjite kṣaṇe |
T02n2934u_001:619: 37 paramānandam eva hetutvena namasyati- tasmā ityādi |
T02n2934u_001:623: yaś cābhyāsān nirvedhabhāgīyā- dyadhigamakrameṇābhinandā samantato'bhijñābala- vaiśāradyādibhir atiśayaguṇaratnaiḥ samṛddhā jinānāṃ nikhilakleśakalaṅkāpagamāt sundarī samantabhadrā paramaprītivasatir mūrtiś caturthaḥ kāyo vajradharaḥ,
T02n2934u_001:624: paṇḍitānāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ hṛdi tādātmyena saka- lavikalpavikṣepapratikṣepān nibhṛtaṃ ko'py avāgbuddhigo- caraḥ- ata evainam adhigamya citrasenādīnāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāve- na vyavasthānaṃ vakṣyati- eko'dvayaḥ paramānandaḥ sar- vāvaraṇavāsanāvaśeṣanidrāvirahāj jāgarti,
T02n2934u_001:626: 40 tad anena ślokena tad eva prajñājñānaṃ rūpaviśeṣeṇa jalam iva taraṅgarūpeṇotpannaṃ caturtho'bhiṣeka ity uktam |
T02n2934u_001:627: sa punar ayaṃ mahāsukhamayo vajradharaḥ sarvatantranidā- nam |
T02n2934u_001:628: iti paṇḍitābhayākaraguptakṛtāyām abhayapaddhatyāṃ śrībuddhakapālamahātantraṭīkāyāṃ caturdaśaḥ paṭalaḥ samāptaḥ |
T02n2934u_001:629: (45) śrīmaddherukavīravartmavivṛter uccairud- añcacchubhāc chittvā saṃsṛtinirvṛtibhramam asau tan- maṇḍale mīlatu |
T02n2934u_001:630: loko'haṃ tu muner amuṣya bibhṛyāṃ mūrtīr anantāḥ prati- prāṇiprahvam adabhraśarma vidadhad dhvas- taprapañcaṃ ciram || 1 ||
T02n2934u_001:639: prajñāśrīr yadvihāryām iyam akṛ- takṛtārthārthisatkalpavallyām asyāś cāsmākavṛttyāstv asamaśubhasudhāpū- rapātheyatṛptiḥ || 4 ||
T02n2934u_001:641: sapādaṣoḍaśaślokaśatī saṃpiṇḍitā pramā paṇḍitair maṇḍanāyāsyāḥ prameva hṛdi vāstavī || || (47)
